name: Kidz
description:
Story3 Kids from a different universe, They're facing the same question.
The adult says this's the best for you, It's mean they want us to fulfill their undone dream? Or just let us walk our own path.
I'm your kid, But not your kid.Features
  • Based on Taiwan Public Television Service Foundation's TV series, On Children
  • 2D Side-scrolling style, Different Art, and Mechanic each episode, Including Action Horror, Point & Click, Parkour!
  • Experience events, See other people's dialog choice
